vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.44;
son of: Shema (H8087);
father of: Jorkeam (H3421)
§ Raham = "belly"
a Judaite, son of Shema, father of Jorkoam, and of the descendants of Caleb
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (2)   descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉含 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "(像)女孩子(?)"
迦勒的後裔, 示瑪的兒子 (代上 2:44)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉含 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "(像)女孩子(?)"
迦勒的后裔, 示玛的儿子 (代上 2:44)
